ur_rna.Utilities

Class OSInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ur_rna.Utilities.OSInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class OSInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class that handles checking whether an OS is a Mac, and setting general properties if that is the case.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
